Project Description
A Rich Client Technology Summary for Windows Presentation Foundation

Note: you can browse this projectâ€™s source code live.



This project is a self-instructional collection showcasing several Microsoft-based desktop technologies and industry-wide techniques including:
  • The Prism 5.0 Composition and Navigation
  • Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF)
  • Cross-Platform Development with the Portable Class Library
  • mahapps.metro, a UI toolkit for WPF

This project contains several Prism Modules, including:

Packed XAML Samples



Custom Control Samples


SVG Fonts Samples in WPF


OData Samples
